marklogic.body: Head wounds and broken noses Bleed like crazy.Â All witnesses have said it was raining like crazy and Zimmerman was on the ground fighting for his life. Yet there's not a drop of blood or mud or grass stains on his clothing. No sign of injury on his head or face. His story is falling apart. The original arresting officer wanted to charge him but was waved Off by a prosecutor. Maybe somebody released this video to show an injustice was being covered up.
